testimonials.author: Jamie
testimonials.quote: Joining Delaware DSA gave me the opportunity to channel my political frustration into meaningful action. I've learned so much about organizing and found a community of people committed to building a better world.

testimonials.author: Taylor
testimonials.quote: I was looking for a way to get involved in local politics that aligned with my values. In DSA, I found not only a political home but also friendships and a sense of purpose working collectively for change.
